alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Oglala Lakota; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:04PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Custer, west central Oglala Lakota, northern Fall River and southeastern Weston Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 503 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dewey to 3 miles east of Hay Canyon Butte. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs, Dewey, Oral, Oelrichs, Smithwick, Prairie Winds Casino, Cottonwood Springs Dam, Burdock, Maverick Junction, Angostura Reservoir, Hay Canyon Butte, Cascade Falls and Cold Brook Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Oglala Lakota; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
